page.title: 19 CLUBS FOR YOUNG PEOPLE
page.content: There are two clubs for young people in the area.The Teme Valley Young Farmers Club is in Felindre.Young people in the valley can get together to enjoy themselves by competing with other clubs in stock judging, soil-testing, hedging, poultry-trussing and other farming activities.They take part in public speaking,quizzes,cookery,craft and display competitions.They hold dances too,and arrange visits to Leisure Centres,theatres and cinemas. The Youth Club is based at Beguildy School and most of the activities are indoor forms of hockey, volley-ball, rounders and netball.The club has often represented Powys in national competitions in draughts,table-tennis, darts and quizzes.This year the quiz team won the county championships and took part in the national finals.
